duties_responsibilities.duty: Passionately represents products and services, demonstrates product and sales know-how to customers.
Provides product demonstrations and educates customers on product capabilities.
Takes a customer-first approach, listens to and evaluates customer needs, and provides appropriate solutions.
Achieves sales and customer experience goals and objectives.
Provides comprehensive customer onboarding and ensures customers understand how to use and manage all products/services.
Partners with customer care to resolve customer issues.
Demonstrates sales excellence and professionalism with integrity and a friendly demeanor to customers and teammates.
Complies with company and retail operational policies and procedures.
Completes training requirements and actively engages in team huddles and learning.
Understands sales compensation plan and its key elements.
Works a flexible schedule, carries and lifts up to 25 pound boxes, stands and moves about the store constantly.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma / GED (Associate's degree preferred)
